Reset

Introduction

Reset is a customized implementation of a combination of different resets, most notably Compass's implementation of Eric Meyer's reset and normalize.css by Nicolas Gallagher, co-created with Jonathan Neal.

Settings

$reset-box-model
Defaults to true.
$reset-box-sizing
Defaults to true.
$reset-font
Defaults to true.
$reset-text-rendering
Defaults to true.
$reset-html-background
Defaults to true.
$reset-baseline
Defaults to true.
$reset-ios
Defaults to true.
$reset-html5
Defaults to true.
$reset-anchor
Defaults to true.
$reset-media
Defaults to true.
$reset-list-style
Defaults to true.
$reset-table
Defaults to true.
$reset-table-cell
Defaults to true.
$reset-input
Defaults to true.
$reset-quotation
Defaults to true.

Mixins

@mixin reset-baseline
@mixin reset-box-sizing
@mixin reset-text-rendering
@mixin reset-html-background
@mixin reset-ios
@mixin reset-html5
@mixin reset-anchor
@mixin reset-media
@mixin reset-list-style
@mixin reset-table
@mixin reset-table-cell
@mixin reset-input
@mixin reset-quotation

Behavior

$reset-box-model, $reset-box-sizing, $reset-font, $reset-text-rendering
$reset-baseline
$reset-html-background, $reset-ios
$reset-html5
$reset-anchor
$reset-media
$reset-list-style
$reset-table
$reset-table-cell
$reset-input
$reset-quotation
